participant_abstract.sent: Meeting seemed to go in a fair fashion.
Not as directed as it should have been but seemed to get there in the end.
Most decisions have been made as to the end design and each person knows what is required of them now.
Didn't flow as well as it should have.

participant_actions.sent: Marketing Expert is going to look at ways to evaluate the product.
I.e. bring in users, street surveys.
Industrial and UI designers are going to look at the design of the actual unit.

participant_decisions.sent: Standard off the shelf components used for many areas.
Battery, LCD, buttons are all fairly common.
Rubber will be used for the outer skin, colour is variable but yellow could be a good start to fit in with company image.
Inner frame to keep structure solid surrounded by the rubber.
UI designer suggests a movable LCD display based around the wrist area and a movable area for joystick to allow left and right handed use.
Two buttons and most navigation to be through the LCD display.
Not completely clear where company ID will go.
